en.title: Her Excellency President Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo of the Philippines Wearing FE's Quantum Pendant!
en.content:
REPORT BY FE PRESIDENTIAL DIRECTOR PASTOR ART MEDINA. 

We are really excited to share with you the picture in the People Asia Magazine April-May Issue, page 81 showing Her Excellency President Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo happily wearing FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant at the Manila Overseas Press Club Invitational Golf Tournament held at Malacanang Palace Golf Course recently. Indeed, FE's Quantum Pendant is one of our President GMA's favorite sport accessories!
